commandDescription: Create a configuration file for running UTAM tests on mobile.
deviceNameFlagDescription: Specify name of target simulator or emulator.
outputFlagDescription: Specify the output config file name and path.
injectionConfigsFlagDescription: Specify path to injection config file for UTAM WebdriverIO service.
error:invalidDeviceNameFlagsDescription: Invalid or missing value for device name.
error:invalidAppActivityFlagsDescription: Invalid or missing value for app activity.
error:invalidAppPackageFlagsDescription: Invalid or missing value for app package.
appActivityIgnored: App Activity will be ignored on iOS
appPackageIgnored: App Package will be ignored on iOS
